trends: There have been 56 other sightings in Buffalo
There was one other sighting in Buffalo on or around May 5th 2012
Summary: On several occasion I witness this object in the sky hovering , then it would move. I always feel a vibration from with in me. I have some photos
divs: Sighting DetailsI have wittnessed similar events through out my life, in which I wrestled with the thought that maybe my mind is deceiving me. Although resently what I thought was a figment of imagination. Has become a reality, I say this because it has been occurring more frequently, and I feel and seemed to communicate with this object. It's like i become sync with this object, and I am starting to be visited by some form of being. After each visit I seemed to have more innfomation. I did some research of my own , and I have discovered that I have been physically in several location where there have been documented siteings. Dating back to my birthplace in 1969. When ever this object is present I can feel this tone resonating throug out my entire body. I can go on and on, so I will stop hear, but there is so much more to tell!!!
